6175  result_tmp.get_svdtensor().set_vectors_and_weights(w,tmp2,htensor_other);
6176  if (key.level() > 0) {
6177  GenTensor<Q> gcoeff2 = copy(gcoeff1(g->get_cdata().s0));
6178  GenTensor<R> hcoeff2 = copy(hcoeff1(h->get_cdata().s0));
6179  Tensor<Q> gtensor = gcoeff2.get_svdtensor().flat_vector_with_weights(gparticle);
6180  Tensor<Q> gtensor_other = gcoeff2.get_svdtensor().flat_vector((gparticle+1)%2);
6181  Tensor<R> htensor = hcoeff2.get_svdtensor().flat_vector_with_weights(hparticle);
6182  Tensor<R> htensor_other = hcoeff2.get_svdtensor().flat_vector((hparticle+1)%2);
6183  Tensor<T> tmp1=inner(gtensor,htensor,1,1); // tmp1(r,r') = sum_j b(r,j) a(r',j)
6184  Tensor<T> tmp2=inner(tmp1,gtensor_other,0,0); // tmp2(r',i) = sum_r tmp1(r,r') a(r,i)
6185  Tensor< typename Tensor<T>::scalar_type > w(tmp2.dim(0));
6186  MADNESS_CHECK(tmp2.dim(0)==htensor_other.dim(0));
6187  w=1.0;
6188  coeffT result_coeff1(get_cdata().vk, get_tensor_type());
6189  result_coeff1.get_svdtensor().set_vectors_and_weights(w,tmp2,htensor_other);
6190  result_tmp(get_cdata().s0)-=result_coeff1;
6191  }
6192  result_coeff+=result_tmp;
6193  }
6194 
6195  // use case: partial_projection of 2-electron functions in svd representation f(1) = \int g(2) h(1,2) d2
6196  // c_i = \sum_j a_j b_ij = \sum_jr a_j b_rj b'_rj
6197  // = \sum_jr ( a_j b_rj) b'_rj )
6198  else if (gcoeff.is_full_tensor() and hcoeff.is_svd_tensor() and result_coeff.is_full_tensor()) {
6199  MADNESS_CHECK(v1[0]==0 and v1[CDIM-1]==LDIM-1);
6200  MADNESS_CHECK(v2[0]==0 or v2[CDIM-1]==KDIM-1);
6201  MADNESS_CHECK(LDIM==CDIM);
6202  int hparticle= v2[0]==0 ? 0 : 1; // which particle to integrate over
6203 
6204  Tensor<T> r=contract2(hcoeff1,gcoeff1.full_tensor(),hparticle);
6205  if (key.level()>0) r(get_cdata().s0)-=contract2(copy(hcoeff1(h->get_cdata().s0)),copy(gcoeff.full_tensor()(g->get_cdata().s0)),hparticle);
6206  result_coeff.full_tensor()+=r;
6207  }
6208  // use case: partial_projection of 2-electron functions in svd representation f(1) = \int g(1,2) h(2) d2
6209  // c_i = \sum_j a_ij b_j = \sum_jr a_ri a'_rj b_j
6210  // = \sum_jr ( a_ri (a'_rj b_j) )
6211  else if (gcoeff.is_svd_tensor() and hcoeff.is_full_tensor() and result_coeff.is_full_tensor()) {
6212  MADNESS_CHECK(v1[0]==0 or v1[CDIM-1]==LDIM-1);
6213  MADNESS_CHECK(v2[0]==0 and v2[CDIM-1]==KDIM-1);
6214  MADNESS_CHECK(KDIM==CDIM);
6215  int gparticle= v1[0]==0 ? 0 : 1; // which particle to integrate over
6216 
6217  Tensor<T> r=contract2(gcoeff1,hcoeff1.full_tensor(),gparticle);
6218  if (key.level()>0) r(get_cdata().s0)-=contract2(copy(gcoeff1(g->get_cdata().s0)),copy(hcoeff.full_tensor()(h->get_cdata().s0)),gparticle);
6219  result_coeff.full_tensor()+=r;
6220 
6221  } else {
6222  MADNESS_EXCEPTION("unknown case in partial_inner_contract",1);
6223  }
6224  }
6225 
6226  MADNESS_CHECK(result_coeff.is_assigned());
6227  result_coeff.reduce_rank(get_thresh());
6228 
6229  if (coeffs.is_local(key))
6230  coeffs.send(key, &nodeT::accumulate, result_coeff, coeffs, key, get_tensor_args());
6231  else
6232  coeffs.task(key, &nodeT::accumulate, result_coeff, coeffs, key, get_tensor_args(), TaskAttributes::hipri());
6233  }
6234 
6235  /// Return the inner product with an external function on a specified function node.
6236 
6237  /// @param[in] key Key of the function node to compute the inner product on. (the domain of integration)
6238  /// @param[in] c Tensor of coefficients for the function at the function node given by key
6239  /// @param[in] f Reference to FunctionFunctorInterface. This is the externally provided function
6240  /// @return Returns the inner product over the domain of a single function node, no guarantee of accuracy.
6241  T inner_ext_node(keyT key, tensorT c, const std::shared_ptr< FunctionFunctorInterface<T,NDIM> > f) const {
6242  tensorT fvals = tensorT(this->cdata.vk);
6243  // Compute the value of the external function at the quadrature points.
6244  fcube(key, *(f), cdata.quad_x, fvals);
6245  // Convert quadrature point values to scaling coefficients.
6246  tensorT fc = tensorT(values2coeffs(key, fvals));
6247  // Return the inner product of the two functions' scaling coefficients.
6248  return c.trace_conj(fc);
6249  }
6250 
6251  /// Call inner_ext_node recursively until convergence.
6252  /// @param[in] key Key of the function node on which to compute inner product (the domain of integration)
6253  /// @param[in] c coeffs for the function at the node given by key
6254  /// @param[in] f Reference to FunctionFunctorInterface. This is the externally provided function
6255  /// @param[in] leaf_refine boolean switch to turn on/off refinement past leaf nodes
6256  /// @param[in] old_inner the inner product on the parent function node
6257  /// @return Returns the inner product over the domain of a single function, checks for convergence.
6258  T inner_ext_recursive(keyT key, tensorT c, const std::shared_ptr< FunctionFunctorInterface<T,NDIM> > f, const bool leaf_refine, T old_inner=T(0)) const {
6259  int i = 0;
6260  tensorT c_child, inner_child;
6261  T new_inner, result = 0.0;
6262 
6263  c_child = tensorT(cdata.v2k); // tensor of child coeffs
6264  inner_child = Tensor<double>(pow(2, NDIM)); // child inner products
6265 
6266  // If old_inner is default value, assume this is the first call
6267  // and compute inner product on this node.
6268  if (old_inner == T(0)) {
6269  old_inner = inner_ext_node(key, c, f);
6270  }
6271 
6272  if (coeffs.find(key).get()->second.has_children()) {
6273  // Since the key has children and we know the func is redundant,
6274  // Iterate over all children of this compute node, computing
6275  // the inner product on each child node. new_inner will store
6276  // the sum of these, yielding a more accurate inner product.
6277  for (KeyChildIterator<NDIM> it(key); it; ++it, ++i) {
6278  const keyT& child = it.key();
6279  tensorT cc = coeffs.find(child).get()->second.coeff().full_tensor_copy();
6280  inner_child(i) = inner_ext_node(child, cc, f);
6281  }
6282  new_inner = inner_child.sum();
6283  } else if (leaf_refine) {
6284  // We need the scaling coefficients of the numerical function
6285  // at each of the children nodes. We can't use project because
6286  // there is no guarantee that the numerical function will have
6287  // a functor. Instead, since we know we are at or below the
6288  // leaf nodes, the wavelet coefficients are zero (to within the
6289  // truncate tolerance). Thus, we can use unfilter() to
6290  // get the scaling coefficients at the next level.
6291  tensorT d = tensorT(cdata.v2k);
6292  d = T(0);
6293  d(cdata.s0) = copy(c);
6294  c_child = unfilter(d);
6295 
6296  // Iterate over all children of this compute node, computing
6297  // the inner product on each child node. new_inner will store
6298  // the sum of these, yielding a more accurate inner product.
6299  for (KeyChildIterator<NDIM> it(key); it; ++it, ++i) {
6300  const keyT& child = it.key();
6301  tensorT cc = tensorT(c_child(child_patch(child)));
6302  inner_child(i) = inner_ext_node(child, cc, f);
6303  }
6304  new_inner = inner_child.sum();
6305  } else {
6306  // If we get to here, we are at the leaf nodes and the user has
6307  // specified that they do not want refinement past leaf nodes.
6308  new_inner = old_inner;
6309  }
6310 
6311  // Check for convergence. If converged...yay, we're done. If not,
6312  // call inner_ext_node_recursive on each child node and accumulate
6313  // the inner product in result.
6314  // if (std::abs(new_inner - old_inner) <= truncate_tol(thresh, key)) {
6315  if (std::abs(new_inner - old_inner) <= thresh) {
6316  result = new_inner;
6317  } else {
6318  i = 0;
6319  for (KeyChildIterator<NDIM> it(key); it; ++it, ++i) {
6320  const keyT& child = it.key();
6321  tensorT cc = tensorT(c_child(child_patch(child)));
6322  result += inner_ext_recursive(child, cc, f, leaf_refine, inner_child(i));
6323  }
6324  }
6325 
6326  return result;
6327  }
6328 
6329  struct do_inner_ext_local_ffi {
6330  const std::shared_ptr< FunctionFunctorInterface<T, NDIM> > fref;
6331  const implT * impl;
6332  const bool leaf_refine;
6333  const bool do_leaves; ///< start with leaf nodes instead of initial_level
6334 
6335  do_inner_ext_local_ffi(const std::shared_ptr< FunctionFunctorInterface<T,NDIM> > f,
6336  const implT * impl, const bool leaf_refine, const bool do_leaves)
6337  : fref(f), impl(impl), leaf_refine(leaf_refine), do_leaves(do_leaves) {};
6338 
6339  T operator()(typename dcT::const_iterator& it) const {
6340  if (do_leaves and it->second.is_leaf()) {
6341  tensorT cc = it->second.coeff().full_tensor();
6342  return impl->inner_adaptive_recursive(it->first, cc, fref, leaf_refine, T(0));
6343  } else if ((not do_leaves) and (it->first.level() == impl->initial_level)) {
6344  tensorT cc = it->second.coeff().full_tensor();
6345  return impl->inner_ext_recursive(it->first, cc, fref, leaf_refine, T(0));
6346  } else {
6347  return 0.0;
6348  }
6349  }
6350 
6351  T operator()(T a, T b) const {
6352  return (a + b);
6353  }
6354 
6355  template <typename Archive> void serialize(const Archive& ar) {
6356  throw "NOT IMPLEMENTED";
6357  }
6358  };
6359 
6360  /// Return the local part of inner product with external function ... no communication.
6361  /// @param[in] f Reference to FunctionFunctorInterface. This is the externally provided function
6362  /// @param[in] leaf_refine boolean switch to turn on/off refinement past leaf nodes
6363  /// @return Returns local part of the inner product, i.e. over the domain of all function nodes on this compute node.
6364  T inner_ext_local(const std::shared_ptr< FunctionFunctorInterface<T,NDIM> > f, const bool leaf_refine) const {
6365  typedef Range<typename dcT::const_iterator> rangeT;
6366 
6367  return world.taskq.reduce<T, rangeT, do_inner_ext_local_ffi>(rangeT(coeffs.begin(),coeffs.end()),
6368  do_inner_ext_local_ffi(f, this, leaf_refine, false));
6369  }
6370 
6371  /// Return the local part of inner product with external function ... no communication.
6372  /// @param[in] f Reference to FunctionFunctorInterface. This is the externally provided function
6373  /// @param[in] leaf_refine boolean switch to turn on/off refinement past leaf nodes
6374  /// @return Returns local part of the inner product, i.e. over the domain of all function nodes on this compute node.
6375  T inner_adaptive_local(const std::shared_ptr< FunctionFunctorInterface<T,NDIM> > f, const bool leaf_refine) const {
6376  typedef Range<typename dcT::const_iterator> rangeT;
6377 
6378  return world.taskq.reduce<T, rangeT, do_inner_ext_local_ffi>(rangeT(coeffs.begin(),coeffs.end()),
6379  do_inner_ext_local_ffi(f, this, leaf_refine, true));
6380  }
6381 
6382  /// Call inner_ext_node recursively until convergence.
6383  /// @param[in] key Key of the function node on which to compute inner product (the domain of integration)
6384  /// @param[in] c coeffs for the function at the node given by key
6385  /// @param[in] f Reference to FunctionFunctorInterface. This is the externally provided function
6386  /// @param[in] leaf_refine boolean switch to turn on/off refinement past leaf nodes
6387  /// @param[in] old_inner the inner product on the parent function node
6388  /// @return Returns the inner product over the domain of a single function, checks for convergence.
6389  T inner_adaptive_recursive(keyT key, const tensorT& c,
6390  const std::shared_ptr< FunctionFunctorInterface<T,NDIM> > f,
6391  const bool leaf_refine, T old_inner=T(0)) const {
6392 
6393  // the inner product in the current node
6394  old_inner = inner_ext_node(key, c, f);
6395  T result=0.0;
6396 
6397  // the inner product in the child nodes
6398 
6399  // compute the sum coefficients of the MRA function
6400  tensorT d = tensorT(cdata.v2k);
6401  d = T(0);
6402  d(cdata.s0) = copy(c);
6403  tensorT c_child = unfilter(d);
6404 
6405  // compute the inner product in the child nodes
6406  T new_inner=0.0; // child inner products
6407  for (KeyChildIterator<NDIM> it(key); it; ++it) {
6408  const keyT& child = it.key();
6409  tensorT cc = tensorT(c_child(child_patch(child)));
6410  new_inner+= inner_ext_node(child, cc, f);
6411  }
6412 
6413  // continue recursion if needed
6414  const double tol=truncate_tol(thresh,key);
6415  if (leaf_refine and (std::abs(new_inner - old_inner) > tol)) {
6416  for (KeyChildIterator<NDIM> it(key); it; ++it) {
6417  const keyT& child = it.key();
6418  tensorT cc = tensorT(c_child(child_patch(child)));
6419  result += inner_adaptive_recursive(child, cc, f, leaf_refine, T(0));
6420  }
6421  } else {
6422  result = new_inner;
6423  }
6424  return result;
6425 
6426  }
6427 
6428 
6429  /// Return the gaxpy product with an external function on a specified
6430  /// function node.
6431  /// @param[in] key Key of the function node on which to compute gaxpy
6432  /// @param[in] lc Tensor of coefficients for the function at the
6433  /// function node given by key
6434  /// @param[in] f Pointer to function of type T that takes coordT
6435  /// arguments. This is the externally provided function and
6436  /// the right argument of gaxpy.
6437  /// @param[in] alpha prefactor of c Tensor for gaxpy
6438  /// @param[in] beta prefactor of fcoeffs for gaxpy
6439  /// @return Returns coefficient tensor of the gaxpy product at specified
6440  /// key, no guarantee of accuracy.
6441  template <typename L>
6442  tensorT gaxpy_ext_node(keyT key, Tensor<L> lc, T (*f)(const coordT&), T alpha, T beta) const {
6443  // Compute the value of external function at the quadrature points.
6444  tensorT fvals = madness::fcube(key, f, cdata.quad_x);
6445  // Convert quadrature point values to scaling coefficients.
6446  tensorT fcoeffs = values2coeffs(key, fvals);
6447  // Return the inner product of the two functions' scaling coeffs.
6448  tensorT c2 = copy(lc);
6449  c2.gaxpy(alpha, fcoeffs, beta);
6450  return c2;
6451  }
6452 
6453  /// Return out of place gaxpy using recursive descent.
6454  /// @param[in] key Key of the function node on which to compute gaxpy
6455  /// @param[in] left FunctionImpl, left argument of gaxpy
6456  /// @param[in] lcin coefficients of left at this node
6457  /// @param[in] c coefficients of gaxpy product at this node
6458  /// @param[in] f pointer to function of type T that takes coordT
6459  /// arguments. This is the externally provided function and
6460  /// the right argument of gaxpy.
6461  /// @param[in] alpha prefactor of left argument for gaxpy
6462  /// @param[in] beta prefactor of right argument for gaxpy
6463  /// @param[in] tol convergence tolerance...when the norm of the gaxpy's
6464  /// difference coefficients is less than tol, we are done.
6465  template <typename L>
6466  void gaxpy_ext_recursive(const keyT& key, const FunctionImpl<L,NDIM>* left,
6467  Tensor<L> lcin, tensorT c, T (*f)(const coordT&),
6468  T alpha, T beta, double tol, bool below_leaf) {
6469  typedef typename FunctionImpl<L,NDIM>::dcT::const_iterator literT;
6470 
6471  // If we haven't yet reached the leaf level, check whether the
6472  // current key is a leaf node of left. If so, set below_leaf to true
6473  // and continue. If not, make this a parent, recur down, return.
6474  if (not below_leaf) {
6475  bool left_leaf = left->coeffs.find(key).get()->second.is_leaf();
6476  if (left_leaf) {
6477  below_leaf = true;
6478  } else {
6479  this->coeffs.replace(key, nodeT(coeffT(), true));
6480  for (KeyChildIterator<NDIM> it(key); it; ++it) {
6481  const keyT& child = it.key();
6482  woT::task(left->coeffs.owner(child), &implT:: template gaxpy_ext_recursive<L>,
6483  child, left, Tensor<L>(), tensorT(), f, alpha, beta, tol, below_leaf);
6484  }
6485  return;
6486  }
6487  }
6488 
6489  // Compute left's coefficients if not provided
6490  Tensor<L> lc = lcin;
6491  if (lc.size() == 0) {
6492  literT it = left->coeffs.find(key).get();
6493  MADNESS_ASSERT(it != left->coeffs.end());
6494  if (it->second.has_coeff())
6495  lc = it->second.coeff().reconstruct_tensor();
6496  }
6497 
6498  // Compute this node's coefficients if not provided in function call
6499  if (c.size() == 0) {
6500  c = gaxpy_ext_node(key, lc, f, alpha, beta);
6501  }
6502 
6503  // We need the scaling coefficients of the numerical function at
6504  // each of the children nodes. We can't use project because there
6505  // is no guarantee that the numerical function will have a functor.
6506  // Instead, since we know we are at or below the leaf nodes, the
6507  // wavelet coefficients are zero (to within the truncate tolerance).
6508  // Thus, we can use unfilter() to get the scaling coefficients at
6509  // the next level.
6510  Tensor<L> lc_child = Tensor<L>(cdata.v2k); // left's child coeffs
6511  Tensor<L> ld = Tensor<L>(cdata.v2k);
6512  ld = L(0);
6513  ld(cdata.s0) = copy(lc);
6514  lc_child = unfilter(ld);
6515 
6516  // Iterate over children of this node,
6517  // storing the gaxpy coeffs in c_child
6518  tensorT c_child = tensorT(cdata.v2k); // tensor of child coeffs
6519  for (KeyChildIterator<NDIM> it(key); it; ++it) {
6520  const keyT& child = it.key();
6521  tensorT lcoeff = tensorT(lc_child(child_patch(child)));
6522  c_child(child_patch(child)) = gaxpy_ext_node(child, lcoeff, f, alpha, beta);
6523  }
6524 
6525  // Compute the difference coefficients to test for convergence.
6526  tensorT d = tensorT(cdata.v2k);
6527  d = filter(c_child);
6528  // Filter returns both s and d coefficients, so set scaling
6529  // coefficient part of d to 0 so that we take only the
6530  // norm of the difference coefficients.
6531  d(cdata.s0) = T(0);
6532  double dnorm = d.normf();
6533 
6534  // Small d.normf means we've reached a good level of resolution
6535  // Store the coefficients and return.
6536  if (dnorm <= truncate_tol(tol,key)) {
6537  this->coeffs.replace(key, nodeT(coeffT(c,targs), false));
6538  } else {
6539  // Otherwise, make this a parent node and recur down
6540  this->coeffs.replace(key, nodeT(coeffT(), true)); // Interior node
6541 
6542  for (KeyChildIterator<NDIM> it(key); it; ++it) {
6543  const keyT& child = it.key();
6544  tensorT child_coeff = tensorT(c_child(child_patch(child)));
6545  tensorT left_coeff = tensorT(lc_child(child_patch(child)));
6546  woT::task(left->coeffs.owner(child), &implT:: template gaxpy_ext_recursive<L>,
6547  child, left, left_coeff, child_coeff, f, alpha, beta, tol, below_leaf);
6548  }
6549  }
6550  }
6551 
6552  template <typename L>
6553  void gaxpy_ext(const FunctionImpl<L,NDIM>* left, T (*f)(const coordT&), T alpha, T beta, double tol, bool fence) {
6554  if (world.rank() == coeffs.owner(cdata.key0))
6555  gaxpy_ext_recursive<L> (cdata.key0, left, Tensor<L>(), tensorT(), f, alpha, beta, tol, false);
6556  if (fence)
6557  world.gop.fence();
6558  }
6559 
6560  /// project the low-dim function g on the hi-dim function f: result(x) = <this(x,y) | g(y)>
6561 
6562  /// invoked by the hi-dim function, a function of NDIM+LDIM
6563 
6564  /// Upon return, result matches this, with contributions on all scales
6565  /// @param[in] result lo-dim function of NDIM-LDIM \todo Should this be param[out]?
6566  /// @param[in] gimpl lo-dim function of LDIM
6567  /// @param[in] dim over which dimensions to be integrated: 0..LDIM or LDIM..LDIM+NDIM-1
6568  template<size_t LDIM>
6569  void project_out(FunctionImpl<T,NDIM-LDIM>* result, const FunctionImpl<T,LDIM>* gimpl,
6570  const int dim, const bool fence) {
6571 
6572  const keyT& key0=cdata.key0;
6573 
6574  if (world.rank() == coeffs.owner(key0)) {
6575 
6576  // coeff_op will accumulate the result
6577  typedef project_out_op<LDIM> coeff_opT;
6578  coeff_opT coeff_op(this,result,CoeffTracker<T,LDIM>(gimpl),dim);
6579 
6580  // don't do anything on this -- coeff_op will accumulate into result
6581  typedef noop<T,NDIM> apply_opT;
6582  apply_opT apply_op;
6583 
6584  woT::task(world.rank(), &implT:: template forward_traverse<coeff_opT,apply_opT>,
6585  coeff_op, apply_op, cdata.key0);
6586 
6587  }
6588  if (fence) world.gop.fence();
6589 
6590  }
6591 
6592 
6593  /// project the low-dim function g on the hi-dim function f: result(x) = <f(x,y) | g(y)>
6594  template<size_t LDIM>
6595  struct project_out_op {
6596  bool randomize() const {return false;}
6597 
6598  typedef project_out_op<LDIM> this_type;
6599  typedef CoeffTracker<T,LDIM> ctL;
6600  typedef FunctionImpl<T,NDIM-LDIM> implL1;
6601  typedef std::pair<bool,coeffT> argT;
6602 
6603  const implT* fimpl; ///< the hi dim function f
6604  mutable implL1* result; ///< the low dim result function
6605  ctL iag; ///< the low dim function g
6606  int dim; ///< 0: project 0..LDIM-1, 1: project LDIM..NDIM-1
6607 
6608  // ctor
6609  project_out_op() {}
6610  project_out_op(const implT* fimpl, implL1* result, const ctL& iag, const int dim)
6611  : fimpl(fimpl), result(result), iag(iag), dim(dim) {}
6612  project_out_op(const project_out_op& other)
6613  : fimpl(other.fimpl), result(other.result), iag(other.iag), dim(other.dim) {}
6614 
6615 
6616  /// do the actual contraction
6617  Future<argT> operator()(const Key<NDIM>& key) const {
6618 
6619  Key<LDIM> key1,key2,dest;
6620  key.break_apart(key1,key2);
6621 
6622  // make the right coefficients
6623  coeffT gcoeff;
6624  if (dim==0) {
6625  gcoeff=iag.get_impl()->parent_to_child(iag.coeff(),iag.key(),key1);
6626  dest=key2;
6627  }
6628  if (dim==1) {
6629  gcoeff=iag.get_impl()->parent_to_child(iag.coeff(),iag.key(),key2);
6630  dest=key1;
6631  }
6632 
6633  MADNESS_ASSERT(fimpl->get_coeffs().probe(key)); // must be local!
6634  const nodeT& fnode=fimpl->get_coeffs().find(key).get()->second;
6635  const coeffT& fcoeff=fnode.coeff();
6636 
6637  // fast return if possible
6638  if (fcoeff.has_no_data() or gcoeff.has_no_data())
6639  return Future<argT> (argT(fnode.is_leaf(),coeffT()));;
6640 
6641  MADNESS_CHECK(gcoeff.is_full_tensor());
6642  tensorT final(result->cdata.vk);
6643  const int k=fcoeff.dim(0);
6644  const int k_ldim=std::pow(k,LDIM);
6645  std::vector<long> shape(LDIM, k);
6646 
6647  if (fcoeff.is_full_tensor()) {
6648  // result_i = \sum_j g_j f_ji
6649  const tensorT gtensor = gcoeff.full_tensor().reshape(k_ldim);
6650  const tensorT ftensor = fcoeff.full_tensor().reshape(k_ldim,k_ldim);
6651  final=inner(gtensor,ftensor,0,dim).reshape(shape);
6652 
6653  } else if (fcoeff.is_svd_tensor()) {
6654  if (fcoeff.rank()>0) {
6655 
6656  // result_i = \sum_jr g_j a_rj w_r b_ri
6657  const int otherdim = (dim + 1) % 2;
6658  const tensorT gtensor = gcoeff.full_tensor().flat();
6659  const tensorT atensor = fcoeff.get_svdtensor().flat_vector(dim); // a_rj
6660  const tensorT btensor = fcoeff.get_svdtensor().flat_vector(otherdim);
6661  const tensorT gatensor = inner(gtensor, atensor, 0, 1); // ga_r
6662  tensorT weights = copy(fcoeff.get_svdtensor().weights_);
6663  weights.emul(gatensor); // ga_r * w_r
6664  // sum over all ranks of b, include new weights:
6665  // result_i = \sum_r ga_r * w_r * b_ri
6666  for (int r = 0; r < fcoeff.rank(); ++r) final += weights(r) * btensor(r, _);
6667  final = final.reshape(shape);
6668  }
6669 
6670  } else {
6671  MADNESS_EXCEPTION("unsupported tensor type in project_out_op",1);
6672  }
6673 
6674  // accumulate the result
6675  result->coeffs.task(dest, &FunctionNode<T,LDIM>::accumulate2, final, result->coeffs, dest, TaskAttributes::hipri());
6676 
6677  return Future<argT> (argT(fnode.is_leaf(),coeffT()));
6678  }
6679 
6680  this_type make_child(const keyT& child) const {
6681  Key<LDIM> key1,key2;
6682  child.break_apart(key1,key2);
6683  const Key<LDIM> gkey = (dim==0) ? key1 : key2;
6684 
6685  return this_type(fimpl,result,iag.make_child(gkey),dim);
6686  }
6687 
6688  /// retrieve the coefficients (parent coeffs might be remote)
6689  Future<this_type> activate() const {
6690  Future<ctL> g1=iag.activate();
6691  return result->world.taskq.add(detail::wrap_mem_fn(*const_cast<this_type *> (this),
6692  &this_type::forward_ctor),fimpl,result,g1,dim);
6693  }
6694 
6695  /// taskq-compatible ctor
6696  this_type forward_ctor(const implT* fimpl1, implL1* result1, const ctL& iag1, const int dim1) {
6697  return this_type(fimpl1,result1,iag1,dim1);
6698  }
6699 
6700  template <typename Archive> void serialize(const Archive& ar) {
6701  ar & result & iag & fimpl & dim;
6702  }
6703 
6704  };
6705 
6706 
6707  /// project the low-dim function g on the hi-dim function f: this(x) = <f(x,y) | g(y)>
6708 
6709  /// invoked by result, a function of NDIM
6710 
6711  /// @param[in] f hi-dim function of LDIM+NDIM
6712  /// @param[in] g lo-dim function of LDIM
6713  /// @param[in] dim over which dimensions to be integrated: 0..LDIM or LDIM..LDIM+NDIM-1
6714  template<size_t LDIM>
6715  void project_out2(const FunctionImpl<T,LDIM+NDIM>* f, const FunctionImpl<T,LDIM>* g, const int dim) {
6716 
6717  typedef std::pair< keyT,coeffT > pairT;
6718  typedef typename FunctionImpl<T,NDIM+LDIM>::dcT::const_iterator fiterator;
6719 
6720  // loop over all nodes of hi-dim f, compute the inner products with all
6721  // appropriate nodes of g, and accumulate in result
6722  fiterator end = f->get_coeffs().end();
6723  for (fiterator it=f->get_coeffs().begin(); it!=end; ++it) {
6724  const Key<LDIM+NDIM> key=it->first;
6725  const FunctionNode<T,LDIM+NDIM> fnode=it->second;
6726  const coeffT& fcoeff=fnode.coeff();
6727 
6728  if (fnode.is_leaf() and fcoeff.has_data()) {
6729 
6730  // break key into particle: over key1 will be summed, over key2 will be
6731  // accumulated, or vice versa, depending on dim
6732  if (dim==0) {
6733  Key<NDIM> key1;
6734  Key<LDIM> key2;
6735  key.break_apart(key1,key2);
6736 
6737  Future<pairT> result;
6738  // sock_it_to_me(key1, result.remote_ref(world));
6739  g->task(coeffs.owner(key1), &implT::sock_it_to_me, key1, result.remote_ref(world), TaskAttributes::hipri());
6740  woT::task(world.rank(),&implT:: template do_project_out<LDIM>,fcoeff,result,key1,key2,dim);
6741 
6742  } else if (dim==1) {
6743  Key<LDIM> key1;
6744  Key<NDIM> key2;
6745  key.break_apart(key1,key2);
6746 
6747  Future<pairT> result;
6748  // sock_it_to_me(key2, result.remote_ref(world));
6749  g->task(coeffs.owner(key2), &implT::sock_it_to_me, key2, result.remote_ref(world), TaskAttributes::hipri());
6750  woT::task(world.rank(),&implT:: template do_project_out<LDIM>,fcoeff,result,key2,key1,dim);
6751 
6752  } else {
6753  MADNESS_EXCEPTION("confused dim in project_out",1);
6754  }
6755  }
6756  }
6757  set_tree_state(redundant);
6758 // this->compressed=false;
6759 // this->nonstandard=false;
6760 // this->redundant=true;
6761  }
6762 
6763 
6764  /// compute the inner product of two nodes of only some dimensions and accumulate on result
6765 
6766  /// invoked by result
6767  /// @param[in] fcoeff coefficients of high dimension LDIM+NDIM
6768  /// @param[in] gpair key and coeffs of low dimension LDIM (possibly a parent node)
6769  /// @param[in] gkey key of actual low dim node (possibly the same as gpair.first, iff gnode exists)
6770  /// @param[in] dest destination node for the result
6771  /// @param[in] dim which dimensions should be contracted: 0..LDIM-1 or LDIM..NDIM+LDIM-1
6772  template<size_t LDIM>
6773  void do_project_out(const coeffT& fcoeff, const std::pair<keyT,coeffT> gpair, const keyT& gkey,
6774  const Key<NDIM>& dest, const int dim) const {
6775 
6776  const coeffT gcoeff=parent_to_child(gpair.second,gpair.first,gkey);
6777 
6778  // fast return if possible
6779  if (fcoeff.has_no_data() or gcoeff.has_no_data()) return;
6780 
6781  // let's specialize for the time being on SVD tensors for f and full tensors of half dim for g
6782  MADNESS_ASSERT(gcoeff.tensor_type()==TT_FULL);
6783  MADNESS_ASSERT(fcoeff.tensor_type()==TT_2D);
6784  const tensorT gtensor=gcoeff.full_tensor();
6785  tensorT result(cdata.vk);
6786 
6787  const int otherdim=(dim+1)%2;
6788  const int k=fcoeff.dim(0);
6789  std::vector<Slice> s(fcoeff.config().dim_per_vector()+1,_);
6790 
6791  // do the actual contraction
6792  for (int r=0; r<fcoeff.rank(); ++r) {
6793  s[0]=Slice(r,r);
6794  const tensorT contracted_tensor=fcoeff.config().ref_vector(dim)(s).reshape(k,k,k);
6795  const tensorT other_tensor=fcoeff.config().ref_vector(otherdim)(s).reshape(k,k,k);
6796  const double ovlp= gtensor.trace_conj(contracted_tensor);
6797  const double fac=ovlp * fcoeff.config().weights(r);
6798  result+=fac*other_tensor;
6799  }
6800 
6801  // accumulate the result
6802  coeffs.task(dest, &nodeT::accumulate2, result, coeffs, dest, TaskAttributes::hipri());
6803  }
6804 
6805 
6806 
6807 
6808  /// Returns the maximum local depth of the tree ... no communications.
6809  std::size_t max_local_depth() const;
6810 
6811 
6812  /// Returns the maximum depth of the tree ... collective ... global sum/broadcast
6813  std::size_t max_depth() const;
6814 
6815  /// Returns the max number of nodes on a processor
6816  std::size_t max_nodes() const;
6817 
6818  /// Returns the min number of nodes on a processor
6819  std::size_t min_nodes() const;
6820 
6821  /// Returns the size of the tree structure of the function ... collective global sum
6822  std::size_t tree_size() const;
6823 
6824  /// Returns the number of coefficients in the function ... collective global sum
6825  std::size_t size() const;
6826 
6827  /// Returns the number of coefficients in the function ... collective global sum
6828  std::size_t nCoeff() const;
6829 
6830  /// Returns the number of coefficients in the function ... collective global sum
6831  std::size_t real_size() const;
6832 
6833  /// print tree size and size
6834  void print_size(const std::string name) const;
6835 
6836  /// print the number of configurations per node
6837  void print_stats() const;
6838 
6839  /// In-place scale by a constant
6840  void scale_inplace(const T q, bool fence);
6841 
6842  /// Out-of-place scale by a constant
6843  template <typename Q, typename F>
6844  void scale_oop(const Q q, const FunctionImpl<F,NDIM>& f, bool fence) {
6845  typedef typename FunctionImpl<F,NDIM>::nodeT fnodeT;
6846  typedef typename FunctionImpl<F,NDIM>::dcT fdcT;
6847  typename fdcT::const_iterator end = f.coeffs.end();
6848  for (typename fdcT::const_iterator it=f.coeffs.begin(); it!=end; ++it) {
6849  const keyT& key = it->first;
6850  const fnodeT& node = it->second;
6851 
6852  if (node.has_coeff()) {
6853  coeffs.replace(key,nodeT(node.coeff()*q,node.has_children()));
6854  }
6855  else {
6856  coeffs.replace(key,nodeT(coeffT(),node.has_children()));
6857  }
6858  }
6859  if (fence)
6860  world.gop.fence();
6861  }
6862 
6863  /// Hash a pointer to \c FunctionImpl
6864 
6865  /// \param[in] impl pointer to a FunctionImpl
6866  /// \return The hash.
6867  inline friend hashT hash_value(const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>* pimpl) {
6868  hashT seed = hash_value(pimpl->id().get_world_id());
6869  detail::combine_hash(seed, hash_value(pimpl->id().get_obj_id()));
6870  return seed;
6871  }
6872 
6873  /// Hash a shared_ptr to \c FunctionImpl
6874 
6875  /// \param[in] impl pointer to a FunctionImpl
6876  /// \return The hash.
6877  inline friend hashT hash_value(const std::shared_ptr<FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>> impl) {
6878  return hash_value(impl.get());
6879  }
6880  };
6881 
6882  namespace archive {
6883  template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t NDIM>
6884  struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive,const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*> {
6885  static void load(const Archive& ar, const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*& ptr) {
6886  bool exists=false;
6887  ar & exists;
6888  if (exists) {
6889  uniqueidT id;
6890  ar & id;
6891  World* world = World::world_from_id(id.get_world_id());
6892  MADNESS_ASSERT(world);
6893  auto ptr_opt = world->ptr_from_id< WorldObject< FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> > >(id);
6894  if (!ptr_opt)
6895  MADNESS_EXCEPTION("FunctionImpl: remote operation attempting to use a locally uninitialized object",0);
6896  ptr = static_cast< const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*>(*ptr_opt);
6897  if (!ptr)
6898  MADNESS_EXCEPTION("FunctionImpl: remote operation attempting to use an unregistered object",0);
6899  } else {
6900  ptr=nullptr;
6901  }
6902  }
6903  };
6904 
6905  template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t NDIM>
6906  struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive,const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*> {
6907  static void store(const Archive& ar, const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*const& ptr) {
6908  bool exists=(ptr) ? true : false;
6909  ar & exists;
6910  if (exists) ar & ptr->id();
6911  }
6912  };
6913 
6914  template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t NDIM>
6915  struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*> {
6916  static void load(const Archive& ar, FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*& ptr) {
6917  bool exists=false;
6918  ar & exists;
6919  if (exists) {
6920  uniqueidT id;
6921  ar & id;
6922  World* world = World::world_from_id(id.get_world_id());
6923  MADNESS_ASSERT(world);
6924  auto ptr_opt = world->ptr_from_id< WorldObject< FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> > >(id);
6925  if (!ptr_opt)
6926  MADNESS_EXCEPTION("FunctionImpl: remote operation attempting to use a locally uninitialized object",0);
6927  ptr = static_cast< FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*>(*ptr_opt);
6928  if (!ptr)
6929  MADNESS_EXCEPTION("FunctionImpl: remote operation attempting to use an unregistered object",0);
6930  } else {
6931  ptr=nullptr;
6932  }
6933  }
6934  };
6935 
6936  template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t NDIM>
6937  struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*> {
6938  static void store(const Archive& ar, FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*const& ptr) {
6939  bool exists=(ptr) ? true : false;
6940  ar & exists;
6941  if (exists) ar & ptr->id();
6942  // ar & ptr->id();
6943  }
6944  };
6945 
6946  template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t NDIM>
6947  struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, std::shared_ptr<const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> > > {
6948  static void load(const Archive& ar, std::shared_ptr<const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> >& ptr) {
6949  const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>* f = nullptr;
6950  ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*>::load(ar, f);
6951  ptr.reset(f, [] (const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> *p_) -> void {});
6952  }
6953  };
6954 
6955  template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t NDIM>
6956  struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, std::shared_ptr<const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> > > {
6957  static void store(const Archive& ar, const std::shared_ptr<const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> >& ptr) {
6958  ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, const FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*>::store(ar, ptr.get());
6959  }
6960  };
6961 
6962  template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t NDIM>
6963  struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, std::shared_ptr<FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> > > {
6964  static void load(const Archive& ar, std::shared_ptr<FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> >& ptr) {
6965  FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>* f = nullptr;
6966  ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*>::load(ar, f);
6967  ptr.reset(f, [] (FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> *p_) -> void {});
6968  }
6969  };
6970 
6971  template <class Archive, class T, std::size_t NDIM>
6972  struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, std::shared_ptr<FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> > > {
6973  static void store(const Archive& ar, const std::shared_ptr<FunctionImpl<T,NDIM> >& ptr) {
6974  ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, FunctionImpl<T,NDIM>*>::store(ar, ptr.get());
6975  }
6976  };
6977  }
6978 
6979 }
